thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com.au Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com.au | airportrentals.com.au
thread.title: Mark Bom

author: Mark Bom
title: Mark Bom
text: I researched car rental on google and found airport rentals the cheapest i could find. We were met at Christchurch airport at 9.30pm and drove around the south island of New Zealand in a new toyota camry completing 3000kms for approx $50 a day (plus fuel). 14 days later we dropped the car off and were delivered back to the airport within 10 mins. How does it get better then that?
